Brazil: São Paulo officially becomes a city.
China: The East India Company (EIC) established a trading post in Guangzhou. The Peiwen Yunfu was completed.
Colombia: Death of painter Gregorio Vasquez de Arce y Ceballos
Russia: Government reform of Peter I: Peter established the Governing Senate to pass laws in his absence. Russo-Turkish War (1710–1711): Peace was concluded with the Treaty of the Pruth. Russia returned Azov to the Ottoman Empire and demolished the town of Taganrog.
